paper_abstract: In this paper, an analysis about how performance of optimal tuning settings for PID controllers, can be degraded when the operating mode is different from the selected one for tuning An index for measuring the overall Performance Degradation is proposed and from the minimum of this, trade-off tuning settings are given
paper_title: PERFORMANCE DEGRADATION ANALYSIS OF CONTROLLER TUNING MODES: APPLICATION TO AN OPTIMAL PID TUNING
